alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jefferson, northeastern Taylor, southeastern Leon and southwestern Madison Counties through 400 PM EST... At 324 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Tallahassee to 14 miles southeast of Monticello. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Greenville, Cody, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Ebb, Lamont, Eridu, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Killearn Estates, Casa Blanco, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
